|            |              |            | New / Refresh |        |

### New Content Checklist

For each new post, verify:

- [ ] QuickAnswer box at top
- [ ] Problem-focused title
- [ ] FAQ section with JSON-LD
- [ ] 5+ internal links added
- [ ] Linked FROM 3+ existing pages
- [ ] Submitted to GSC
- [ ] Image optimized (.webp)
